reviews.author: Linda D.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend 2\. Charlston Estate Services Ltd. for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.content: 2\. Charlston Estate Services Ltd.'s knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation 2\. Charlston Estate Services Ltd. provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

content.about: Charleston Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Charleston area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.
